sentences.sContent: The hurricane devastated a large section of the coast.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hurricane devastated a large section of the coast.
sentences.sCn: 飓风毁坏了沿海地区的大部分。

sentences.sContent: The hurricane demage was assessed at three million dollars.
sentences.sContent_eng: The hurricane demage was assessed at three million dollars.
sentences.sCn: 飓风损害赔偿金的金额被确定为三百万美元。

sentences.sContent: The building can accommodate all of the offshore workers and protect them from hurricane damage.
sentences.sContent_eng: The building can accommodate all of the offshore workers and protect them from hurricane damage.
sentences.sCn: 这个建筑能容纳所有的海上工人并且保护他们不受飓风的伤害。

phrases.pCn: n. 防风灯；飓风灯；马灯

trans.tranOther: a storm that has very strong fast winds and that moves over water
